price: 24. Mpo Allah afuta baye bazali koloba solo na bosôló bwa bango, mpe apesa etumbu na bato ya bilongi mibale soki alingi, to akolimbisa bango. Ya soló Allah azali molimbisi atonda ngolu.
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ بِصِدۡقِهِمۡ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu al-ṣādiqīna biṣid'qihim wayuʿadhiba al-munāfiqīna in shāa aw yatūba ʿalayhim inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
